outputs.output_descr: # MT phase-out of Ozone Depleting Substance (ODS) consumed by manufacturing industries, # workshops on Ozone Layer Protection and the importance of ODS phase-out, # workshops on the implementation of ministerial decrees and relevant regulations on the banning of ODS production and goods containing ODS (including list of ODS, logo of non-CFCs, etc.)

project_descr: Sector Phase-out Plan for Elimination of CFCs in the Refrigeration (Manu facturing) Sector in Indonesia
project_title: Sector Phase-out Plan in the Refrigeration
